item.description:
TIME 10.00AM SHARP!!!!!! at Mt Monadnock.

So please start from your respective carpooling locations accordingly.

We WILL START the hike at latest by 10.30AM.

If you happen to come later than 10.30am you will have to have to run and catch up with the group :)

 

Please bring

1] At least 1 liter of drinking water,

2] your lunch,

3] Cold weather jackets and gloves (as usually its a whole different weather at the top),

4] Good boots

5] and a patient and jolly composure and this hike will be a lot of fun.

Oh! and the date is subject to change based on the weather conditions that weekend.

http://www.mountainsummits.com/mountains/newhampshire/monadnock.htm

Finally, we all will need to car pool. There is tight parking space $5 per car and its environmentally friendly thing to do.
item.name: Hike up Mt Monadnock
